CustomField.description: System field showing the delimited list of Parent Task Names 'up the chain' to the Top-level Parent Task. Top-level Parent Tasks will have a Task Name Chain value equal to their own Name. Their immediate child Tasks will have a Task Name Chain value equal to their own Name, then the name of their Parent Task, and so on.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System field showing the delimited list of Parent Task Names 'up the chain' to the Top-level Parent Task.
CustomField.label: Task Name Chain
